title: Mycobacterium smegmatis acyltransferase catalyzes the synthesis of esters and polyesters
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00038B, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Filippo Fabbri, Ilaria Vergani, Silvia Donoso, Luca Nespoli, Valeria Marisa Rocca, Lisa Moni, Georg M. Guebitz, Martina Letizia Contente, Alessandro Pellis
In the present work, Mycobacterium smegmatis acyltransferase (MsAcT) was successfully immobilized onto polypropylene beads and the selectivity was investigated both in esterification and polycondensation reactions.
